 ------------------------
**Data Center Info**
 ------------------------

 * Location: **Vilnius, Lithuania**
 * Looking Glass: [lg.time4vps.com](http://lg.time4vps.com/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)

 --------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Container, Storage, and KVM VPS package includes**
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------

 * Most popular Linux OS templates (64-bit)
 * Pre-installed free control panels: Webmin, ISPconfig 3, VestaCP
 * Server load monitoring graphs
 * The ability to change server resources in 5 minutes without a restart
 * The possibility to flush IP tables directly from the client area
 * Web Console (a.k.a Rescue Console)
...and more...

 ------------
 **Features for Resellers**
 ------------

 * Reseller discount tier from 5% to 20%
 * Time4VPS WHMCS module
 * Instant Service setup
 * Instant Service addon setup
 * Instant Service upgrade/downgrade
 * Instant cPanel/WHM license activation
 * Weekly and daily VPS backups
 * Reverse DNS management
 * Free Time4VPS DNS manager

 ------------
 **Features for Affiliates**
 ------------

 * 100% commissions on VPN order
 * 50 EUR commissions on VPS order
 * Detailed reports
 * Access to our marketing materials
 * Automatic payouts to PayPal
 * 31 days to wait before getting affiliate reward

 ---------------------------------
**Billing and Guarantee**
 ---------------------------------

 We accept PayPal, Visa / Mastercard credit cards, Bitcoin, Paysera (Webmoney, Bank transfer).

 Zero-risk, 30-day money-back guarantee – if you're not completely satisfied, we'll refund your payment.

 Click [here](https://www.time4vps.com/refund-policy?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer) for more on our billing and refund information.

 ------------
 **Support**
 ------------

Time4VPS provides professional support via our, e-mail ticket system, [community forum](https://community.time4vps.com?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer), live chat!

 ------------
 **Mini F.A.Q**
 ------------

_Q: How can you offer such low prices?_
> A: Why not? By having our own [Data center](https://www.time4vps.com/about/data-center/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer), [hardware](https://www.time4vps.com/about/hardware/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer) and [network equipment](https://www.time4vps.com/about/network/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer) we can offer a very good ratio between service price and quality.

_Q: I hate you for no apparent reason. Why?_
> A: Take a [look](https://www.time4vps.com/about/company/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer) at our team. We are here for you and we love you! Have any doubts? Just give us a shout out at info@time4vps.com ;)

_Q: Can I receive a discount?_
> A: Do you really need one? Just look at our Annually or Biennially prices. Calculate. Are you feeling bad about asking for an additional discount?

_Q: You enforce some limitations on a VPS. What the hell?_
> A: In order to maintain the best possible balance between service price and quality there is reasonable resource allocation for each service. Without such control, there would a disaster for both - customer and the provider.

_Q: Do you allow...?_
> A: Check our [TOS](https://www.time4vps.com/tos?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)

_Q: Is the discount recurring?_
> A: No, the discount is not recurring.

_Q: Can I get paid for referring customers?_
> A: Yes, from now on you can become a Time4VPS affiliate and get cashback on referred customer purchases. More info on [website](https://www.time4vps.com/affiliates/?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=offer)
